text: Ilmarinen is an important person in Finnish mythology. He is a very good smith who made the sky. He also made the Sampo, a magical machine that makes salt, gold and food. He tried to create a new moon and a sun, but failed. Ilmarinen married one of LouhiÂ´s daughters. ==Related pages== *Ilmari, a given name Category:Finnish mythology
title: Ilmarinen
